items.title: CSTF-Net: Cross-Modal Stock Trend Forecasting Network
items.description: Developed a lightweight multimodal fusion framework integrating FinBERT-based news sentiment features, TCN-encoded financial time-series signals, and a correlation-enhanced technical indicator module for stock direction prediction. Constructed and evaluated the model on 84K aligned newsâ€“price samples from AAPL, MSFT, AMZN, and META under strict chronological splits. Benchmarked against LSTM, GRU, TCN, XGBoost, and LightGBM to validate performance improvements and robustness.

items.title: Deep Sentiment Analysis for Crude Oil Futures Prediction
items.description: Collected and quantified large-scale social media and news data to investigate their predictive power on crude oil futures log returns. Fine-tuned FinBERT for sentiment extraction and integrated sentiment signals into Random Forest models to evaluate predictive performance. Designed controlled experiments comparing social media-only, news-only, and combined feature sets to analyze their relative contribution to forecasting accuracy.
